name: CNXT THeXDesK

api_list.name: #://CNXT
api_list.description: #://CNXT facilitates the integration of https://Domain.TLD links within its HTP (HashTag Protocol) ecosystem using Special Character Anchored LiNx. This mechanism enables a seamless, encrypted connection between the traditional domain name system (DNS) and the HTP’s decentralized ledger.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cnxt-thexdesk.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cnxt-thexdesk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
